title: ECD Connect Data Report
text:
A summary of ECD Connect’s reach. This includes the open-access ECD Connect App, all white-label versions and Grow Great’s CHW Connect.



4


partner organisations




1,912


unique user sign-ups

total number of children added across all platforms
